attributes.action: ensure that all sports events which are of national importance, involve national teams or are part of the British sporting heritage, are available live on terrestial television for the whole nation..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although this petition does not wish to see subscription services stopped, it does propose that events involving national teams (e.g. football, rugby, cricket internationals); events of national importance (e.g. a British team in European final); and events which are part of the British Sporting Heritage (e.g. FA Cup Final, the Ashes, Oxford - Cambridge Boat Race, Grand National) should be available live on terrestial television, for the whole nation, and not only for those who (can afford to) purchase subscription services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
